Patient Name : Vikas Reddy
Patient ID : CH-3021
Age 745
Gender : Male
Admission Date: 02/08/2025
Discharge Date: 07/08/2025
Diagnosis:
- Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (controlled)
- Mild Hypertension
Treatment Summary:
- Metformin 500mg twice daily
- Amlodipine 5mg once daily
- Low-sodium diabetic diet
- Daily BP and sugar monitoring
Follow-up Instructions:
Visit endocrinology OPD after 15 days.
Continue medications, avoid high-sugar foods.
Consultant: Dr. Sanjay Kapoor
Signature:

Patient Name : Rahul Sharma
Patient ID :P2025-015
Date > 14/08/2025

Gender : Male
Diagnosis:
- Acute Sinusitis
Prescription:
1. Amoxicillin 500mg — 1 tablet thrice daily for 5 days
2. Paracetamol 650mg — 1 tablet twice daily after meals
3. Steam inhalation — twice daily
Doctor’s Notes:
Increase fluid intake, avoid cold drinks, follow up after 7 days.
Doctor: Dr. Neha Agarwal (ENT Specialist)
Contact: +91-9876543210
